description: Carex 'Phoenix Green' is a striking and majestic sedge. This evergreen grass-like form has lush green foliage boasting an attractive, fine-textured display that will brighten any garden setting. Its easy to maintain and perfect for adding an extra touch of texture to planting schemes. Carex 'Phoenix Green' has an upright habit that forms a neat, rounded mound, and its ability to thrive in a variety of soils, climates and light conditions makes it an ideal choice for gardeners. It tolerates drought once established, providing an easy-care evergreen that will add beauty to gardens throughout the seasons.
